sentences.en: " But antiquity now is a yellow dust, Confusing in the grasses its ruins and white Bones . "
sentences.cn: 黄尘足今古, 白骨乱 蓬蒿.

sentences.en: Acupuncture has been used as medical means since antiquity in China.
sentences.cn: 针灸在中国自远古以来就被用作医疗手段了.

sentences.en: Animals and plants of remote antiquity turned to fossils.
sentences.cn: 远古的动植物变成了化石.

sentences.en: Books of authority are all of some antiquity.
sentences.cn: 权威著作都有点古老色彩.

sentences.en: Concern for fracture has surely existed back to antiquity.
sentences.cn: 有关断裂的问题显然要追溯到古代.

sentences.en: His silly jokes, chestnuts of great antiquity, made Bertha sweat coldly.
sentences.cn: 他那些愚蠢的玩笑, 早已过时的馊话弄得丽莎直冒冷汗.

sentences.en: Homer was a great man of antiquity.
It has an origin lost in the mists of antiquity.
sentences.cn: 由于年代久远,其渊源已无法考证.

sentences.en: It indicates the antiquity of the tradition.
sentences.cn: 这表明该传统源远流长。

sentences.en: My meeting with Sadat was thus sandwiched between the contemplations of antiquity.
sentences.cn: 我和萨达特的会晤就这样安排在两次观赏名胜古迹之间.

sentences.en: Our inquiries ascend to the remotest antiquity.
sentences.cn: 我们的研究可追溯到远古.

sentences.en: The museum contains the remains of Chinese antiquity.
sentences.cn: 博物馆藏有中国古代的遗物.

sentences.en: The origins of this ancient structure are lost in antiquity.
sentences.cn: 这座古建筑的由来已经失传了.

sentences.en: The statue was brought to Rome in antiquity .
sentences.cn: 这座雕像是古时运到罗马的。

sentences.en: The town was famous in antiquity for its white bulls.
sentences.cn: 该镇在古时以其白色公牛闻名。

words.tran_cn: 古老的，年代久远的；过时的，古董的；古风的，古式的
古董，古玩；古风，古希腊和古罗马艺术风格

trans.tran_cn: 古老，古代，古迹，古物，古人，古代的风俗习惯
